statements: DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE device_id = 2 AND temperature < 25;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE id = 100 AND device_id = 1;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND temperature > 25;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM device_info WHERE status = 'active' AND installation_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND data_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' AND location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM device_sensor_mapping WHERE sensor_id = 201 AND device_id = 301;
